moduware-header.copy: Debug information copied to your clipboard

gateway.connectionFailed: Failed to establish connection, please try again
gateway.noFirmwareInstalled: The connected Moduware device doesn't have a firmware installed, you can install it from Settings -> Updates
gateway.deviceNameLengthValidationMessage: Device name cannot be longer than 18 characters or shorter than 3.
gateway.renameDeviceSuccessMessage: Because of Bluetooth name cache you may need to restart your Moduware device and your phone to see name change.
gateway.renameDeviceErrorMessage: There was an error during name change, name may not be set.
gateway.moduleNotRecognized: The module you plugged in wasn't recognized, please unplug it and plug it again

firmware.flashFirmwareError: Something went wrong, please try again
firmware.blockingProcessWarning: Do not close this app or turn off your device

disconnected.title: Slide left!
disconnected.message: Let's connect your Moduware device to your phone! To manage connections and devices use sidebar.

autoconnecting.title: Auto Connecting
autoconnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings.

connected.editInstructions: To switch between tiles tap on the module you want to change.

initializing.title: Initializing modules
initializing.message: It will take a few seconds to initialize all modules.

checking.title: Checking for updates
checking.message: It will take a few seconds to check for new updates.

noUpdates.title: No new updates available
noUpdates.message: You have latest version of software for current configuration

updates.checkInProgress: a check for updates is already in progress

pairedDevices.title: Paired Devices
pairedDevices.unpairError: Error happened during unpairing from the device, try again

tiles.title: Available tiles
tiles.instruction: Select a tile you want to switch to.
tiles.cannotDeleteDeveloperTile: Cannot delete develop tile, to be able to delete it you have to remove the tile folder from device storge manually
tiles.somethingWentWrong: something went wrong, please try again.
tiles.lookForInternetTile: Looking for tile in the internet
tiles.couldNotGetInternetTiles: Counldn't get internet tiles, check your internet connection and try again
tiles.noFirmwareInstalled: The module do not have firmware installed, please go to debug screen and click on restore stable firmware button for that module.

autoConnecting.title: Auto Connecting
autoConnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings.

disconnected.title: Connect Modpack
disconnected.message: Find the device you want to connect to

scanning.title: Looking for Modpack
scanning.message: Make sure your bluetooth and Modpack are On

notFound.title: Device not found
notFound.message: Try again and make sure that your Modpack is On
